dct_alternative_sm: Whale chart of the world / by M.F. Maury, L.L.D. Lieut. U.S. Navy, superin'dt. of U.S.N. Observatory ; compiled from materials in the Bureau of Ordnance and Hydrography by P.M.A.C. Jackson.
dct_description_sm: Shows geographical locations of sperm and right whales.

The whale chart was released as series F a part of Maury's "Wind and current charts", series A-F. For complete discussion, see "The wind and current chart series produced by Matthew Fontaine Maury," by Marc I. Pinsel, in Navigation : Journal of the Institute of Navigation, v. 28, no. 2 (Summer, 1981), p. 123-137.
Includes text, "Diagram for Explanation," table, and note.
dct_creator_sm: Maury, Matthew Fontaine, 1806-1873. Wind and current charts.
United States. Bureau of Ordnance and Hydrography
dct_rights_sm: This map is in the public domain.
dct_rightsHolder_sm: Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library. https://www.lib.umich.edu/about-us/policies/copyright-policy
